sections.title: Sphere Singer (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Sphere Singer class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Graceful Hand (Ex) (Sphere Singer)
sections.description: The sphere singer gains Starry Grace as a bonus feat, ignoring its prerequisites.

sections.title: Starsong (Su) (Sphere Singer)
sections.description: The sphere singer can use Perform (sing) to create magical effects similar to bardic performance, with various abilities that scale with level. Starsong performances are move actions to start and free actions to maintain, cannot be disrupted, and include abilities like Wanderer's Hymn, Sweet Dreams, Butterfly, Guide My Steps, and Fortune's Favor.

sections.title: Versatile Performance (Ex) (Sphere Singer)
sections.description: At 2nd and 6th levels, the sphere singer gains versatile performance like a bard, but is limited to Perform (sing) or Perform (dance) initially.

sections.title: Wandering Dream (Su) (Sphere Singer)
sections.description: Starting at 4th level, the sphere singer gains Lucid Dreamer as a bonus feat and can contact familiar people through dreams each night, with abilities scaling to allow dream council and dream-based suggestions.

sections.title: Tapestry Traveler (Ex, Sp) (Sphere Singer)
sections.description: At 10th level, the sphere singer's type changes to fey, gains butterfly wings with 50-foot fly speed, becomes immune to cold, and gains the no breath ability.
